title: Synthesis, in vitro and in silico study of novel 1,3-diphenylurea derived Schiff bases as competitive α-glucosidase inhibitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29288-29300

Anam Rubbab Pasha, Saeed Ullah, Ajmal Khan, Sobia Ahsan Halim, Javid Hussain, Tanzila Rehman, Rimsha Talib, Rima D. Alharthy, Hamdy Kashtoh, Magda H. Abdellattif, Ahmed Al-Harrasi, Zahid Shafiq
Diabetes mellitus has become a major global health burden because of several related consequences, including heart disease, retinopathy, cataracts, metabolic syndrome, collapsed renal function, and blindness.
